result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Robert Harrington was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court
Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes: Court ordered restitution on the amount of $99.00 paybale to Alexx B.

*Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges of this case, including any applicable mandatory surcharges and supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Court found the Domestic Abuse surcharge is applicable.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
*Defendant to pay all supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

*NO firearms; weapons.
*Due to this DV conviction he may never possess firearms or ammunition.

*NO contact with victim, UNLESS the agent has approved a modification to the order.
*Court advised defendant of penalties for violating the no contact order.

*Mental Health Evaluation and take ALL prescribed medication, and/or any treatment deemed appropriate.        
*Anger Management counseling.
*Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.

*Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment including random screens.
*Maintain absolute sobriety.

timeConds.notes: *Time is stayed pending review on 12/04/15 at 1:30pm.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael Robert Harrington in court with attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub.  Patrick D. Winter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Probation Agent is in court.  Probation Status Review report filed and reviewed.  Defendant is compliant or mostly compliant with probation.  The remaining condition time is stayed.  Court found that further review is not needed.

Defendant Michael Robert Harrington in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law.  Defendant sentenced to serve 90 days in the House of Correction with credit for 1 day time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 12 months.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
-As a condition of probation, the Court ordered the defendant to serve 15 days in the House of Correction.  This time is stayed pending a review.
-Mental Health Evaluation and take ALL prescribed medication, and/or any treatment deemed appropriate.        
-Anger Management counseling.
-Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment including random screens.
-Maintain absolute sobriety.
-Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.
-No contact with victim, UNLESS the agent has approved a modification to the order.
-Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges of this case, including any applicable mandatory surcharges and supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Court found the Domestic Abuse surcharge is applicable.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
-Defendant to pay all supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.
-Maintain employment.
-No firearms; weapons.
-Court ordered restitution in the amount of $99.00 payable to Alexx B.
Received and filed: Pretrial Sentence Credit, Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief, Memorandum of Conditions of Probation.  Court advised defendant of penalties for violating the no contact order and due to this DV conviction he may never possess firearms or ammunition.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for 08-27-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Michael Robert Harrington in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead NO CONTEST.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the Defendant guilty and enters judgment of conviction into the record forthwith. 

Court orders case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 40.  Court advises defendant that all conditions of bail remain as previously set including the No Contact Order.
Clerk:  jms

Defendant Michael Robert Harrington in court with attorney Michael Jude.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Case set for deferred prosecution agreement.  Defense would like a little more time.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Michael Robert Harrington in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Pretrial Conference held.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for June 25, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Alexx B, her work and residence.

Defendant Michael Robert Harrington in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Defendant Michael Robert Harrington in custody.  Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.
